about.summary: Computation of the alpha-shape and alpha-convex hull of a given sample of points in the plane. The concepts of alpha-shape and alpha-convex hull generalize the definition of the convex hull of a finite set of points. The programming is based on the duality between the Voronoi diagram and Delaunay triangulation. The package also includes a function that returns the Delaunay mesh of a given sample of points and its dual Voronoi diagram in one single object.

Computation of the alpha-shape and alpha-convex hull of a given sample of points in the plane. The concepts of alpha-shape and alpha-convex hull generalize the definition of the convex hull of a finite set of points. The programming is based on the duality between the Voronoi diagram and Delaunay triangulation. The package also includes a function that returns the Delaunay mesh of a given sample of points and its dual Voronoi diagram in one single object.

name: r-alphahull
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.5" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-alphahull
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/alphahull_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/alphahull/alphahull_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 82104b049b945b62b5b62f1520ff789a77638ab7e91650e50d6eb191373a8012

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r.utils
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-interp
    - r-sgeostat
    - r-spatstat.geom
    - r-spatstat.random
    - r-splancs
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r.utils
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-interp
    - r-sgeostat
    - r-spatstat.geom
    - r-spatstat.random
    - r-splancs

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('alphahull')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('alphahull')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=alphahull
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Computation of the alpha-shape and alpha-convex hull of a given sample of points in the plane. The concepts of alpha-shape and alpha-convex hull generalize the definition of the convex hull of a finite set of points. The programming is based on the duality between the Voronoi diagram and Delaunay triangulation. The package also includes a function that returns the Delaunay mesh of a given sample of points and its dual Voronoi diagram in one single object.
  license_family: GPL
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - colineroyaux
